name: acl-knex-mysql
description: A Knex.js backend for node_acl base on https://github.com/christophertrudel/node_acl_knex support MySql
author: Jacy Kong <junny.kong@gmail.com>

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
